abstract: On Wednesday, we challenged Well readers to really think like a doctor. We asked you to figure out the diagnosis for a complicated patient and to design the testing strategy necessary to reach that diagnosis; to do, in short, what every doctor has to do in order to make a diagnosis.

headline.main: Think Like a Doctor: The Right Test Solved!
